column2: that means [[Quenya]]; the Teleri knew it primarily as the tongue of the [[Noldor]]
column3: for they had few contacts with the [[Vanyar]]<ref>{{HM|WJ}} p. 375</ref>.

column1: The first element of the word Goldórin
column2: is the compound form of [[Golodo]] "Noldo"; the long ''ó'' of the word reflects the long final vowel of the [[primitive Elvish]] word ''[[ñgolodô]]''.
